title: Windows ARM64 Internals: Deconstructing Pointer Authentication
summary:
Pointer Authentication Code (PAC) is an anti-exploit feature on ARMv8.3-A/v9.0-A architectures that signs pointers using a cryptographic signature stored in unused bits of 64-bit addresses, validated at runtime via special CPU instructions. Windows ARM64 utilizes PAC for "instruction pointers," primarily signing return addresses in both user-mode and kernel-mode.

PAC enablement on Windows begins at `ntoskrnl.exe`'s `KiSystemStartup`. The bootloader (`winload.efi`) provides initial support information and a kernel pointer signing key, generated by `SymCryptRngAesGenerate`. Windows currently uses ARM's "key B," a 128-bit value loaded into the `APIBKeyLo_EL1` and `APIBKeyHi_EL1` system registers (EL1 denotes kernel-mode privilege). Although these registers are shared, user-mode (EL0) cannot directly access them. HVCI protects critical PAC variables, making them read-only.

System-wide PAC capabilities are determined by `KiDetectPointerAuthSupport` and fully enabled during system initialization based on a feature flag (`Feature_Pointer_Auth_User__private_featureState`) and registry overrides. Supported and enabled PAC features can be queried via `NtQuerySystemInformation` (`SystemPointerAuthInformation`).

For user-mode, PAC is unconditionally enabled on a per-process basis during process creation (`PspAllocateProcess`). Each user-mode process receives its own randomly generated signing key (if not inherited), distinct from the global kernel key. The active signing key in the system registers is dynamically updated during user-to-kernel and kernel-to-user transitions (e.g., `KiSystemServiceExit`). Despite SDK options to enable/disable user-mode PAC, it is always active on Windows, with no documented means to disable it or audit violations.
chinese_title: Windows ARM64 内部原理：解构指针认证
chinese_summary:
指针认证码（PAC）是ARMv8.3-A/v9.0-A架构上的一种反漏洞利用功能，它通过将加密签名存储在64位地址的未使用位中来对指针进行签名，并在运行时通过特殊的CPU指令进行验证。Windows ARM64利用PAC用于“指令指针”，主要是在用户模式和内核模式下对返回地址进行签名。

Windows上PAC的启用始于`ntoskrnl.exe`的`KiSystemStartup`。引导加载程序（`winload.efi`）提供初始支持信息和一个由`SymCryptRngAesGenerate`生成的内核指针签名密钥。Windows目前使用ARM的“密钥B”，这是一个128位的值，加载到`APIBKeyLo_EL1`和`APIBKeyHi_EL1`系统寄存器中（EL1表示内核模式权限）。尽管这些寄存器是共享的，但用户模式（EL0）无法直接访问它们。HVCI保护关键的PAC变量，使其只读。

全系统PAC功能由`KiDetectPointerAuthSupport`确定，并在系统初始化期间根据功能标志（`Feature_Pointer_Auth_User__private_featureState`）和注册表覆盖设置完全启用。可以通过`NtQuerySystemInformation`（`SystemPointerAuthInformation`）查询支持和已启用的PAC功能。

对于用户模式，PAC在进程创建（`PspAllocateProcess`）期间是按进程无条件启用的。每个用户模式进程（如果未继承）都会收到自己随机生成的签名密钥，该密钥与全局内核密钥不同。系统寄存器中的活动签名密钥在用户到内核以及内核到用户的转换期间（例如`KiSystemServiceExit`）动态更新。尽管SDK提供了启用/禁用用户模式PAC的选项，但它在Windows上始终处于活动状态，并且没有文档化的方法可以禁用它或审计违规行为。

title: ISPs more likely to throttle netizens who connect through CG-NAT: Cloudflare
summary:
Cloudflare research reveals that internet users connecting through Carrier-Grade Network Address Translation (CG-NAT) are significantly more prone to throttling or blocking by ISPs and security systems. CG-NAT allows hundreds or thousands of devices to share a single IPv4 address, a necessity due to IPv4 scarcity, particularly in regions like Africa and Asia that received smaller initial allocations.

The issue arises because traditional IP-based security measures assume a one-to-one user-to-IP relationship. If one user behind a CG-NAT engages in malicious activity, the entire shared IP can be flagged for blocklisting or rate-limiting, inadvertently penalizing many innocent users.

Cloudflare's study found that despite CG-NAT IPs having bot scores indicating *more* human traffic, they are subjected to rate-limiting three times more often than non-CG-NAT IPs. Researchers Vasilis Giotsas and Marwan Fayed conclude this introduces an "unseen source of bias on the Internet," disproportionately affecting users in developing regions and impacting digital equity and user experience.

They stress the need for accurate CG-NAT IP detection to minimize these collateral effects and ensure fair application of security measures. The article also highlights that a global transition to IPv6, which CG-NAT was initially intended to bridge, remains the ultimate solution.
chinese_title: Cloudflare：运营商更有可能对通过CG-NAT连接的网民限速
chinese_summary:
Cloudflare 研究显示，通过运营商级网络地址转换 (CG-NAT) 连接的互联网用户更容易被互联网服务提供商 (ISP) 和安全系统限速或屏蔽。由于 IPv4 地址稀缺，CG-NAT 允许数百甚至数千台设备共享一个 IPv4 地址，这尤其在非洲和亚洲等初始分配较少的地区是必然选择。

问题在于传统的基于 IP 的安全措施假定用户与 IP 之间存在一对一的关系。如果 CG-NAT 后的一名用户从事恶意活动，整个共享 IP 可能会被标记为黑名单或限速，无意中惩罚了许多无辜的用户。

Cloudflare 的研究发现，尽管 CG-NAT IP 的机器人评分显示其承载了*更多*的人类流量，但它们被限速的频率是非 CG-NAT IP 的三倍。研究人员 Vasilis Giotsas 和 Marwan Fayed 总结认为，这引入了“互联网上一种看不见的偏见来源”，不成比例地影响了发展中地区的用户，并影响了数字公平性和用户体验。

他们强调需要准确检测 CG-NAT IP，以最大程度地减少这些附带影响并确保安全措施的公平应用。文章还指出，全球向 IPv6 的过渡（CG-NAT 最初旨在作为过渡方案）仍然是最终解决方案。

title: A year without caffeine (2013)
summary:
In "A year without caffeine" (2013), Bryan Alexander recounts his decision and experience of giving up caffeine for an entire year. Driven by a desire for self-control and curiosity about his dependency, Alexander initiated his caffeine-free year on January 1st, 2013.

The initial phase was challenging, marked by withdrawal symptoms like headaches, lethargy, and a general lack of alertness, which persisted for several weeks. He noted a significant dip in his morning energy and the ability to "power through" tasks that caffeine previously enabled.

As the year progressed, he observed several changes. His sleep quality improved, becoming deeper and more consistent. He also developed new routines and coping mechanisms to manage energy levels, such as taking short walks or adjusting his work schedule. While he still missed the stimulating effects and the social ritual of coffee at times, he found that his body adapted, and he no longer experienced the dramatic energy crashes associated with caffeine.

By the end of the year, Alexander concluded that while caffeine offers immediate benefits, living without it brought a sense of liberation from dependency and a more stable, albeit lower, baseline energy level. He decided to reintroduce caffeine selectively and in moderation, demonstrating that the experiment provided valuable insights into his habits and physiology.

最初的阶段充满挑战，表现为戒断症状，如头痛、嗜睡和普遍的注意力不集中，这些症状持续了数周。他注意到早晨的精力显著下降，以及过去咖啡因能帮助他“奋力完成”任务的能力也随之减弱。

随着这一年的进行，他观察到了一些变化。他的睡眠质量得到改善，变得更深沉、更规律。他还形成了新的作息习惯和应对机制来管理精力水平，例如短途散步或调整工作时间。尽管有时他仍然怀念咖啡的提神效果和社交仪式感，但他发现自己的身体已经适应，并且不再经历与咖啡因相关的剧烈能量崩溃。

到年底，亚历山大总结道，尽管咖啡因能提供即时的好处，但没有咖啡因的生活带给了他一种摆脱依赖的自由感，以及一个更稳定、尽管较低的基线能量水平。他决定有选择地、适度地重新引入咖啡因，这表明这项实验为他的习惯和生理状况提供了宝贵的见解。

title: UK minister ducks cost questions on nationwide digital ID scheme
summary:
UK Minister for Digital Government and Data, Ian Murray, has declined to specify the cost of the government's proposed nationwide digital ID scheme to a House of Commons select committee. Murray stated that the budget is "to be determined" after public consultation concludes, as it depends on the final system design and various use cases.

The scheme, announced by Prime Minister Keir Starmer in September, aims to provide all legal residents with a digital identity by August 2029. Initially intended for proving eligibility to work, it's also touted to offer benefits for accessing key services. The plan involves storing digital IDs on smartphones, building on existing digital wallet initiatives, with technical delivery managed by the Government Digital Service (GDS) within DSIT.

While initial costs will come from DSIT, Murray expects other government departments to contribute as their use cases develop. Conservative MP Kit Malthouse questioned departments' willingness to fund the scheme if it means diverting money from their own core priorities. Murray emphasized that the digital ID is a "prime ministerial priority."

Additionally, Murray confirmed that the government would not appoint a new Chief Digital Officer, integrating the role's responsibilities into the Permanent Secretary's position for a cross-government approach, a move questioned by committee chair Chi Onwurah regarding necessary digital transformation experience. He also noted a delay in the AI roadmap due to a change in technology minister.

该计划由首相基尔·斯塔默于九月宣布，旨在到2029年8月为所有合法居民提供数字身份。该计划最初旨在用于证明工作资格，也被宣传为在获取关键服务方面提供便利。该计划包括将数字身份存储在智能手机上，基于现有的数字钱包举措，技术交付由科学、创新和技术部（DSIT）内的政府数字服务（GDS）负责管理。

虽然初始成本将由DSIT承担，但默里预计，随着其他政府部门的用例发展，它们也将作出贡献。保守党议员基特·马尔豪斯质疑，如果这意味着从其核心优先事项中挪用资金，各部门是否愿意资助该计划。默里强调，数字身份是“首相的优先事项”。

title: Show HN: Cynthia – Reliably play MIDI music files – MIT / Portable / Windows
summary:
Cynthia is an MIT-licensed, portable desktop application for Windows (and Wine for Linux/Mac) designed for reliable MIDI music playback. It supports `.mid`, `.midi`, and `.rmi` files in formats 0 and 1, playing them from local folders or `.m3u` playlists with capacity for thousands of entries.

Users can adjust playback speed (10% to 1000%), volume (up to 200%), and output device on-the-fly. A prominent progress bar allows for easy time jumping, complemented by rewind/fast forward options and various play modes like "Repeat One," "Repeat All," and "Random."

The application provides rich real-time visual feedback through dedicated panels for Tracks, Channels, Notes, and a customizable Piano keyboard viewer, alongside a scrolling lyrics viewer. An integrated mixer allows fine-tuning of individual channel volumes.

Cynthia supports up to 10 simultaneous MIDI playback devices, offering per-device controls for time shifting (to compensate for lag) and volume. It features a custom-built, stable playback engine and automatically resyncs to OS MIDI device changes. Additional features include drag-and-drop file support, Xbox controller integration, automatic compact mode for small screens, and extensive GUI customization. It includes 25 sample MIDI files ready to play.

title: Gnome is better macOS than macOS
summary:
The author, a long-time Linux user primarily of GNOME, acquired a MacBook Pro due to the current laptop market, dissatisfaction with Windows' bloat and forced updates, and macOS's superior capabilities for media production (audio/video) compared to Linux.

Despite macOS's strengths in its target domain, the author finds it "counter-intuitive" and "user-unfriendly" compared to GNOME. Key criticisms include:

1.  **Virtual Desktops:** GNOME offers faster, gesture-driven switching and automatically creates new desktops as needed, offering unlimited spaces. macOS's switching feels capped in speed, and new desktops must be added manually.
2.  **Maximize/Fullscreen:** macOS's fullscreen function moves applications to a dedicated, far-right virtual desktop, disrupting workflow. The author prefers GNOME's extension that places fullscreen apps next to the current desktop, or the ability to prevent constant rearrangement.
3.  **Mission Control:** macOS's Mission Control is deemed far less functional than GNOME's Overview. While macOS allows rearranging windows and desktops, GNOME's Overview integrates window closing, dock tweaking, searching, and application launching, offering "a lot of control."
4.  **The Dock:** The author prefers GNOME's design where the dock is only visible in Overview, saving vertical screen space and avoiding accidental activation, unlike macOS's constantly visible dock.

Ultimately, the author, acknowledging their bias, concludes that GNOME provides a better and more logical user experience than macOS in many aspects, even for someone adopting Apple hardware.
chinese_title: Gnome 是比 macOS 更好的 macOS
chinese_summary:
作者是一位长期使用Linux（主要是GNOME）的用户，鉴于当前笔记本电脑市场现状、对Windows系统臃肿和强制更新的不满，以及macOS在媒体制作（音频/视频）方面相对于Linux的卓越能力，购置了一台MacBook Pro。

尽管macOS在其目标领域表现出色，但作者认为与GNOME相比，macOS“反直觉”且“不友好”。主要批评点包括：

1.  **虚拟桌面：** GNOME提供更快、手势驱动的切换，并能根据需要自动创建新桌面，提供无限空间。macOS的切换速度感觉受到限制，且必须手动添加新桌面。
2.  **最大化/全屏：** macOS的全屏功能会将应用程序移动到一个专用、最右侧的虚拟桌面，打断工作流程。作者更喜欢GNOME的扩展，该扩展能将全屏应用放置在当前桌面旁边，或者能够阻止持续的重新排列。
3.  **调度中心（Mission Control）：** macOS的“调度中心”被认为远不如GNOME的“概览”（Overview）实用。尽管macOS允许重新排列窗口和桌面，但GNOME的“概览”则集成了窗口关闭、调整Dock、搜索和启动应用程序等功能，提供了“大量控制”。
4.  **Dock栏：** 作者更喜欢GNOME的设计，即Dock只在“概览”中可见，这样可以节省垂直屏幕空间并避免意外激活，这与macOS始终可见的Dock不同。

最终，作者承认其偏见，总结认为，即使对于一个转向使用苹果硬件的人来说，GNOME在许多方面也提供了比macOS更好、更符合逻辑的用户体验。

title: TSA to charge $18 fee for travelers without Real ID or passport
summary:
The Transportation Security Administration (TSA) is implementing an $18 fee for domestic travelers who do not present a Real ID-compliant driver's license, state ID, or a valid U.S. passport at airport security checkpoints. This new charge is expected to begin in late 2025 or early 2026, as discussed in the article published around November 21, 2025.

This fee specifically targets individuals who, despite Real ID enforcement for domestic air travel commencing in May 2025, continue to travel with non-compliant identification. These passengers currently undergo enhanced screening, which requires additional time and resources from TSA staff. The $18 surcharge is intended to cover these increased operational costs and to incentivize travelers to obtain the necessary compliant identification.

Passengers presenting acceptable forms of ID, such as a Real ID, a passport, a military ID, or a permanent resident card, will not incur this fee. The TSA's objective is to reduce security line delays, improve the efficiency of screening processes, and offset the expenses associated with processing non-compliant travelers. The fee will be collected at the security checkpoint, and refusal to pay or adequately prove identity through other means could result in denied boarding.

出示可接受身份证明（如Real ID、护照、军人身份证或永久居民卡）的旅客将无需支付此费用。TSA的目标是减少安检排队延误，提高安检流程效率，并抵消处理不符合要求旅客所产生的费用。该费用将在安检口收取，如果拒绝支付或无法通过其他方式充分证明身份，可能会导致被拒绝登机。

title: Passing the Torch – My Last Root DNSSEC KSK Ceremony as Crypto Officer 4
summary:
The article "Passing the Torch – My Last Root DNSSEC KSK Ceremony as Crypto Officer 4" recounts the evolution of the Internet's Domain Name System (DNS) and the author's long-standing role in its security. DNS emerged in the early 1980s as a distributed solution, replacing centrally managed "hosts files" for a rapidly expanding network. Initially lacking robust security due to its collegial, restricted access environment, the need for better protection became evident by the 1990s, leading to the development of DNSSEC.

Real impetus for DNSSEC deployment arose after Dan Kaminsky's 2008 discovery of a critical DNS cache poisoning flaw. Within two years, the DNS root was cryptographically signed. To foster trust and transparency in this process, ICANN established a rigorous framework: utilizing geographically diverse, highly secure Key Management Facilities (KMFs), offline Hardware Security Modules (HSMs) requiring a quorum of Crypto Officers (COs) for activation, and highly scripted, auditable, and live-streamed ceremonies.

The author, Crypto Officer 4 for KMF-East, details their 15-year tenure, having been among the original volunteers at the first root signing ceremony in 2010 and the last original KMF-East CO. They witnessed significant milestones, including staff's agile adaptation to new HSMs.

On November 13th, 2025, the author passed the torch to Lodrina Cherne. The decision to step down, while not prompted by scandal, was multifaceted: exceeding the initial 5-year commitment, advocating for greater diversity among Trusted Community Representatives (TCRs) beyond the "DNS-old-boy-network," and navigating delays caused by COVID-19, a key shareholder's death, and HSM transitions, followed by an extended period to ensure continuity. The author expresses satisfaction that DNSSEC is now widely validated by major resolvers, acknowledging their proud contribution to the system's security and integrity.
chinese_title: 薪火相传 – 我作为4号密码官的最后一次根DNSSEC KSK仪式
chinese_summary:
薪火相传——我作为第4号加密官的最后一次根DNSSEC KSK仪式

题为“薪火相传——我作为第4号加密官的最后一次根DNSSEC KSK仪式”的文章，讲述了互联网域名系统（DNS）的演变以及作者在其安全性方面长期扮演的角色。DNS在20世纪80年代初作为一个分布式解决方案出现，取代了为迅速扩展的网络集中管理的“主机文件”。最初由于其协作性、受限访问的环境而缺乏强大的安全性，到了20世纪90年代，对更好保护的需求变得显而易见，从而促成了DNSSEC的开发。

丹·卡明斯基（Dan Kaminsky）于2008年发现了一个关键的DNS缓存投毒漏洞后，DNSSEC部署的真正动力随之产生。两年之内，DNS根区通过加密方式进行了签名。为了在此过程中培养信任和透明度，ICANN建立了一个严格的框架：利用地理位置分散、高度安全的密钥管理设施（KMFs），离线硬件安全模块（HSMs），需要达到法定人数的加密官（COs）才能激活，以及高度规范化、可审计和现场直播的仪式。

作者，作为KMF-East的第4号加密官，详细介绍了他们长达15年的任期。他们是2010年首次根签名仪式上的首批志愿者之一，也是KMF-East最后一位原始加密官。他们见证了重要的里程碑，包括工作人员对新HSM的敏捷适应。

2025年11月13日，作者将火炬传给了Lodrina Cherne。尽管并非因丑闻而辞职，但这一决定是多方面的：超出了最初5年的承诺；倡导在可信社区代表（TCRs）中实现超越“DNS老男孩网络”的更大多样性；以及应对由COVID-19、一位关键股东的去世和HSM过渡所造成的延误，之后又经历了一段延长期以确保连续性。作者对DNSSEC现在已得到主要解析器的广泛验证表示满意，并认可了他们对系统安全和完整性的骄傲贡献。

title: The feds want to make it illegal to even possess an anarchist zine
summary:
The article highlights the alarming prosecution of Dallas artist Daniel "Des" Sanchez, who was indicted for "corruptly concealing" a box of zines and pamphlets, labeled "Antifa materials," after a July 4 protest outside an ICE facility. Sanchez, who was not even at the protest, faces charges because these materials, some titled "Insurrectionary Anarchy," are considered "literal insurrectionist propaganda" by federal prosecutors, despite being constitutionally protected free speech.

The author argues this case exemplifies the Trump administration's escalating efforts to criminalize left-wing activism and free expression, exploiting a loophole to punish "transporting" controversial literature when direct possession or publication is protected. Similar tactics have been observed in Georgia's "Stop Cop City" RICO charges, which included "zine distribution," and investigations into journalists for reporting on sensitive information.

This prosecutorial overreach, the article warns, creates a dangerous "slippery slope" that chills dissent, making individuals fear engaging with any "anti-government" or controversial ideas. The author reminds readers that the Constitution's framers enshrined press freedom precisely to protect radical, anti-government literature akin to Sanchez's zines, not just mainstream media. The administration's actions are presented as an authoritarian threat to press freedom and a fundamental right in a free society.
chinese_title: 联邦政府甚至想把持有无政府主义刊物定为非法。
chinese_summary:
文章重点关注了达拉斯艺术家丹尼尔·“德斯”·桑切斯（Daniel "Des" Sanchez）令人震惊的起诉案，他因在7月4日ICE设施外抗议活动后，“恶意藏匿”一箱被贴有“反法西斯（Antifa）材料”标签的独立杂志和小册子而被起诉。桑切斯本人甚至没有参加抗议，但他面临指控，因为这些材料——其中一些标题为“叛乱无政府主义”（Insurrectionary Anarchy）——尽管受到宪法言论自由的保护，却被联邦检察官视为“实实在在的煽动叛乱宣传品”。

作者认为，此案体现了特朗普政府将左翼激进主义和言论自由定为犯罪的日益升级的努力，借机利用漏洞，惩罚“运输”有争议的文献，而直接持有或出版却是受保护的。类似的策略也出现在佐治亚州针对“阻止警察城”（Stop Cop City）运动的RICO指控中，其中包括“独立杂志分发”，以及对报道敏感信息的记者进行的调查。

文章警告，这种检察官权力滥用制造了一个危险的“滑坡效应”，压制了异议，使个人不敢接触任何“反政府”或有争议的思想。作者提醒读者，宪法制定者正是为了保护像桑切斯独立杂志那样激进的、反政府的文献，而不仅仅是主流媒体，才将新闻自由写入宪法的。政府的行动被视为对新闻自由和自由社会基本权利的威权主义威胁。

title: Demand for UK Food Bank Up 15% Year on Year
summary:
The Canterbury food bank is experiencing a drastic surge in demand, serving as a stark indicator of the UK's ongoing cost of living crisis. Its monthly food parcel distribution has escalated from 450 in 2019 to over 1,100 today, placing it among the top 5% nationally, with demand up 15% year-on-year.

The charity's monthly food expenditure has soared from virtually nothing in 2022 to £10,000, despite increased food donations. This is exacerbated by rising food prices, meaning every pound now buys 10% less food than 18 months ago. Meanwhile, monetary donations have sharply declined, and grants are less predictable, leaving the charity receiving only 60% of its expected income this year.

The article illustrates the human cost through a Kent mother of four struggling with basic necessities, relying on £1 frozen food and fearing Christmas expenses will impact food budgets. Benefits and wages are failing to keep pace with rising costs, deepening poverty, especially in areas with insecure, low-paid jobs; even students are now seeking help.

A key policy concern is the two-child benefit cap, with calls for its abolition to lift hundreds of thousands of children out of poverty. Food bank staff highlight rising costs for food, fuel, and rent, coupled with unpredictable work hours, as primary reasons for increased hardship.

Food banks have adapted by becoming more professional, using technology, and offering fresh food. Experts suggest they are no longer a temporary measure but have become a "necessary part of the welfare state," signifying a "new normal" of sustained high demand.
chinese_title: 英国食物银行需求同比上涨15%
chinese_summary:
坎特伯雷食物银行正经历需求量激增，这清楚地表明英国正面临持续的生活成本危机。其每月分发的食物包裹数量已从2019年的450份增加到如今的1,100多份，需求量位居全国前5%，并同比增长15%。

尽管食物捐赠有所增加，该慈善机构的每月食物开支已从2022年的几乎为零飙升至1万英镑。食物价格上涨使情况更加恶化，这意味着现在每英镑能购买的食物比18个月前减少了10%。与此同时，货币捐款急剧下降，拨款也变得更难以预测，导致该慈善机构今年只收到预期收入的60%。

文章通过一位肯特郡有四个孩子的母亲的故事，说明了这场危机对人的影响。她正为基本生活必需品而挣扎，依赖1英镑的冷冻食品，并担心圣诞节开支会影响食物预算。福利和工资未能跟上上涨的生活成本，加剧了贫困，尤其是在那些工作不稳定、薪资低的地区；甚至连学生现在也寻求帮助。

一个关键的政策担忧是“两孩福利帽”政策，人们呼吁废除该政策，以帮助数十万儿童摆脱贫困。食物银行的工作人员指出，食物、燃料和租金成本的上涨，再加上不稳定的工作时间，是导致困境加剧的主要原因。

食物银行通过变得更加专业化、利用技术和提供新鲜食物来适应（变化）。专家表示，它们不再是临时措施，而是已成为“福利国家不可或缺的一部分”，这标志着持续高需求的“新常态”。

title: Parallel Threads in Racket v9.0
summary:
Racket v9.0 introduces native shared-memory parallel threads, enabling programs to fully utilize multicore hardware, a significant leap from the previous version's concurrent-only coroutine threads. Creating a parallel thread is as simple as adding `#:pool 'own` to the `thread` call, offering substantial real-time speedups where CPU time remains similar but wall-clock time can be halved for parallelized tasks.

This development follows Racket's complete rebuild on Chez Scheme (Racket CS) since 2017, which laid a robust foundation with improvements like a parallel garbage collector and memory fences. While Racket previously offered `places` for coarse-grained parallelism and `futures` for fine-grained tasks, the new parallel threads are more versatile, addressing `futures`' limitations by not blocking on operations like parameter access or mutable hash table manipulation.

Benchmarks show excellent scaling for CPU-bound computations and tasks with unshared data structures. However, I/O-bound operations currently exhibit limited speedup due to coarse-grained locks in the I/O layer. Sequential programs might experience a minor performance overhead (up to 6-8% in specific fine-grained cases) due to the necessary underlying lock mechanisms.

Racket's existing synchronization primitives (semaphores, channels, `box-cas!`) are fully compatible with parallel threads. Although parallel threads expose the machine's weak memory-consistency model, Racket guarantees memory safety through internal fences. The developers anticipate rare compatibility issues for existing libraries.
chinese_title: Racket v9.0 并行线程
chinese_summary:
Racket v9.0 引入了原生共享内存并行线程，使程序能够充分利用多核硬件，这与先前版本仅支持并发的协程线程相比是一个重大飞跃。创建并行线程只需在 `thread` 调用中添加 `#:pool 'own`，对于并行化任务，这能提供显著的实时加速，其中CPU时间保持相似，但实际运行时间可以减半。

这一发展是在Racket自2017年以来在Chez Scheme（Racket CS）上进行彻底重建之后实现的，这为Racket奠定了坚实的基础，带来了并行垃圾回收器和内存屏障等改进。尽管Racket以前提供了用于粗粒度并行性的 `places` 和用于细粒度任务的 `futures`，但新的并行线程用途更广泛，解决了 `futures` 的局限性，即在参数访问或可变哈希表操作等操作上不会阻塞。

基准测试表明，对于CPU密集型计算和使用非共享数据结构的任务，扩展性表现出色。然而，由于I/O层中的粗粒度锁，I/O密集型操作目前只显示有限的加速。顺序程序可能会由于必要的底层锁机制而经历轻微的性能开销（在特定细粒度情况下高达6-8%）。

Racket现有的同步原语（信号量、通道、`box-cas!`）与并行线程完全兼容。尽管并行线程暴露了机器的弱内存一致性模型，Racket仍通过内部内存屏障保证了内存安全。开发人员预计现有库的兼容性问题将很少见。

title: McMaster Carr – The Smartest Website You Haven't Heard Of (2022)
summary:
McMaster-Carr's website (mcmaster.com) is highlighted as the internet's best e-commerce site, praised for its exceptional functionality in the industrial supply sector. The author, an engineer, commends its design for doing "what it needs to, and nothing else."

Visually, the site is minimalist, predominantly grayscale with green and yellow accents. It deliberately avoids common web distractions like popups, animations, or marketing banners, even using grayscale product images to prevent visual clutter. This "function over form" approach directly serves the user's primary goal: finding specific industrial parts quickly and efficiently, rather than browsing.

The site's superior search and filtering interface is its main strength. Users can rapidly narrow down its vast catalog by starting with a general term, then utilizing subcategories and detailed left-navigation filters based on quantitative specifications (e.g., thread size, length, material). Simplified schematic illustrations and integrated explanations act as an "engineer's handbook," aiding both precise searches and informed decision-making. This efficient system is contrasted with the poor filtering on sites like Amazon.

A standout feature is the instant availability of CAD files for nearly every part, significantly streamlining mechanical engineers' workflow by allowing direct import into 3D models. The author suggests a minor improvement: making the homepage search bar more prominent. Ultimately, McMaster.com is celebrated as a product that deeply understands its customer, proving that a relentless focus on core functionality, divorced from typical web design trends, creates a profoundly effective user experience.
chinese_title: 麦克马斯特·卡尔 – 你可能还不知道的最智能网站 (2022)
chinese_summary:
McMaster-Carr的网站(mcmaster.com)被誉为互联网上最佳的电子商务网站，因其在工业用品领域的卓越功能而备受赞誉。作者作为一名工程师，称赞其设计“只做它需要做的，不多不少”。

从视觉上看，该网站设计极简，以灰色调为主，辅以绿色和黄色点缀。它刻意避免了常见的网络干扰，如弹窗、动画或营销横幅，甚至使用灰度产品图片以防止视觉混乱。这种“功能优先于形式”的方法直接服务于用户的首要目标：快速高效地找到特定的工业零件，而不是漫无目的地浏览。

该网站卓越的搜索和筛选界面是其主要优势。用户可以通过从一般术语开始，然后利用子类别和基于定量规格（例如螺纹尺寸、长度、材料）的详细左侧导航筛选器，快速缩小其庞大的目录范围。简化的示意图和集成解释如同“工程师手册”，有助于精确搜索和做出明智决策。这种高效系统与亚马逊等网站糟糕的筛选功能形成鲜明对比。

一个突出特点是几乎每个零件都可即时获取CAD文件，通过允许直接导入3D模型，极大地简化了机械工程师的工作流程。作者建议了一个小改进：让主页搜索栏更醒目。最终，McMaster.com被誉为一款深刻理解客户的产品，它证明了不懈专注于核心功能，脱离典型的网页设计趋势，能够创造出极其有效的用户体验。

title: Meet the AI workers who tell their friends and family to stay away from AI
summary:
AI workers, including raters and trainers, are actively advising their friends and family to avoid or be extremely cautious with generative AI, citing deep distrust in the models they help develop. This skepticism is rooted in a consistent industry focus on rapid turnaround times, often at the expense of quality, safety, and ethical considerations.

Workers like Krista Pawloski, who moderates content for Amazon Mechanical Turk, recounted nearly missing a racial slur, exposing the potential scale of errors. Anonymous Google raters revealed being assigned to evaluate sensitive medical or ethical content without relevant expertise, or observing biased outputs, such as models refusing to answer questions about Palestinian history while readily discussing Israel's. They criticize vague instructions, minimal training, unrealistic deadlines, and poor quality input data, echoing the "garbage in, garbage out" principle.

Experts confirm this trend, stating that companies seem to prioritize speed and profit over careful validation, often overlooking crucial rater feedback. Audits reveal an alarming increase in AI models confidently dispensing false information while their non-response rates plummet.

These frontline workers emphasize that AI is "fragile," not futuristic, built by a vast, often invisible human workforce. They are taking it upon themselves to raise awareness about AI's unreliability, inherent biases, human labor, and environmental impact. They draw parallels to the textile industry's past, urging the public to demand transparency regarding data sourcing, copyright, and fair worker compensation to drive ethical advancements in AI.
chinese_title: 认识那些劝说亲友远离AI的AI从业者
chinese_summary:
AI工作者，包括标注员和训练师，正在积极建议他们的亲友避开生成式AI，或对其保持高度警惕，理由是他们对所参与开发的模型深感不信任。这种怀疑根源于行业长期以来对快速周转的执着，常常牺牲了质量、安全和伦理考量。

像为亚马逊Mechanical Turk审核内容的克里斯塔·帕夫洛斯基（Krista Pawloski）这样的工作者，曾差点漏掉一句种族歧视性言论，暴露出潜在的错误规模。匿名的谷歌标注员透露，他们被指派评估敏感的医疗或伦理内容，却缺乏相关专业知识；或者观察到有偏见的输出，例如模型拒绝回答有关巴勒斯坦历史的问题，却乐于讨论以色列的历史。他们批评指令模糊、培训不足、截止日期不切实际以及输入数据质量差，这印证了“垃圾进，垃圾出”的原则。

专家证实了这一趋势，称公司似乎将速度和利润置于仔细验证之上，常常忽视了关键的标注员反馈。审计显示，AI模型自信地散布虚假信息的案例惊人地增加，而它们的不回应率却大幅下降。

这些一线工作者强调，AI是“脆弱”的，而非充满未来感的，它是由庞大而常常“隐形”的人力大军构建的。他们主动承担起责任，提高公众对AI不可靠性、固有偏见、人力劳动投入及其环境影响的认知。他们将其与纺织业的过去相比较，敦促公众要求数据来源、版权和公平工人报酬方面的透明度，以推动AI领域的伦理进步。

title: X.com is gonna snitch you out to the public if you use a VPN
summary:
X.com is reportedly set to implement a new feature that will flag users who access the platform via Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). VPNs are vital for online privacy, protecting individuals from cyber threats, and enabling anonymity for activists, journalists, and those in oppressive countries.

The initiative was first hinted at by X's Head of Product, Nikita Bier, on October 14, 2025, who stated X was experimenting with displaying an account's country of origin to help users verify content authenticity. Although Bier mentioned "privacy toggles," he indicated that configuring these might also be highlighted on a user's profile.

Online security advocates quickly criticized the move as an attempt to "out" individuals relying on VPNs for anonymity. This was further corroborated on November 15, 2025, by analyst Aaron Perris, who revealed X will display a warning if a VPN is used to obscure an account's true location.

Leaked code indicates the warning text will read: "'One of our partners has indicated that you may be connecting via a proxy—such as a VPN—which may change the country or region that is displayed on your profile.'" Subsequently, other users will see "Country or region may not be accurate" on such profiles. The article criticizes X for this action, suggesting the platform should focus on tackling misinformation rather than undermining user privacy.
